p: 1-(4-methylbenzyl)-2-(pyridin-4-yl)cyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid (5). Purification by column chromatography eluting with ethyl acetate/petroleum ether (1:9 → 3:7) afforded the desired product as a yellowish powder in 64% yield. 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ: 7.23 − 7.17 (m, 4H); 7.11 − 7.05 (m, 4H); 3.23 (d, J = 15.54, 1H); 2.87 (t, J = 8.1, 1H); 2.32 (s, 3H); 2.11 (d, J = 15.69, 1H); 1.96 − 1.92 (m, 1H); 1.53 (t, J = 6.72, 1H). 13C NMR (100.6 MHz, CDCl 3) δ: 183.6; 142.3; 127.4; 126.7; 126.4; 125.2; 124.2; 122.0; 35.0; 33.6; 30.7; 18.7; 11.4. MS (ESI): m/z: 268.5 [M + H]
